  Stuck? We're here to help!    

  Start a Full Migration to Office 365

What is a Full Migration?

Use this type of migration for "big bang" (single pass) migrations, or following an earlier pre-stage migration. Use this type of migration after MX record cutover, to make sure you are not missing any data.

1 Item Selected
1 Item Will Migrate
120 Licenses Available
1 Licenses Required

  View Migration Errors

  • Your migration failed checking source credentials. Office 365 user names should always be specified as email addresses. Ensure user names are specified as email addresses.
    6 months ago Source Server
Back

OPEN IN NEW WINDOW    Back to Errors List

Office 365 user names should always be specified as email addresses

Office 365 user names should always be specified as email addresses: This error indicates that the specified Office 365 user name is invalid. Office 365 requires users to login with an email address, not a user name as in "John Doe" or "domain\johndoe".

Resolution:

We recommend the following:

  1. If using administrative credentials for Office 365, check the admin user name specified on your connector
  2. If not using administrative credentials for Office 365, check the mailbox owner user name specified on the mailbox
  3. In all cases, make sure the user name work when logging in at https://login.microsoftonline.com
Back
